CommandTranslatorRule:
This rule catches calls to open next images, in the File > Open Next menu. It opens the next image in the same folder that of the current image.
# Open the "next" image in a directory, with respect to the currently selected one forward = True; # browse direction is forward, set to False for backward # Interpret arguments if forward: arg = 'forward' else: arg = 'backward' # Invoke plugin with arguments NextImageOpener().run(arg)
